title: Property Manager
description: Lead property operations for luxury residential complex. Experience with tenant relations and maintenance coordination required.

title: Leasing Agent
description: Assist prospective tenants with apartment viewings and lease applications. Weekend availability required.

title: Maintenance Technician
description: Perform routine maintenance and repairs across multiple residential properties. HVAC experience a plus.

title: Concierge
description: Provide exceptional customer service to residents and guests in upscale residential building.

title: Security Officer
description: Monitor property security systems and conduct regular patrols. Night shift availability required.

title: Assistant Property Manager
description: Support property manager with daily operations, tenant communications, and administrative tasks.
